O bom e velho CS, ninguém nunca esquece ele, um ótimo game que fez parte da minha infância e me diverte até hoje, a quantidade e salas para jogar é enorme e o VAC (Sistema Anti-Hack) é perfeito, e os players jogam muito bem, podem  comprar que é garantida muita diversão... =D

Ahh CS: Source a great game indeed but it had its hiccups, from weird first time source engine quirks to bad server reg, but nevertheless a great game. It brings back memories and it is still very fun, I love CSS but there are no other servers besides, Dust 2 and Office, and frenkly that gets really bland after an hour or 2. It still has the great awesome fun of Counter Strike 1.6 but I don't know this one just kinda isn't my favorite cup of tea, don't get me wrong this is an AMAZING game but I would say this is probably the weakest CS (not counting condition zero) in my opinion. But I still love it, so I give CS: Source an 8.9 out of 10

Fun game, even years after release. This game doesn't age at all. The community can be a little harsh with newbies at times, but it is definitely a great game to play if you are playing with friends or happen to get in a good server. It also runs well on basically any computer even if it's a couple of years old. No need for a great graphics card, as with most source engine games, which I love. Definitely recommended for anyone looking for a good FPS.
